summary: This bill, S. 1043, proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the energy credit for qualified fuel cell property. Specifically, it seeks to extend the credit's availability until January 1, 2033, modifying section 48(c)(1)(E) of the code. The amendments are to apply to property construction that begins after December 31, 2024. The bill was introduced in the Senate on March 13, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Finance.
